name: Law Of The Ocean
description:
The main character, Billano, explored the treasure under the sea with his colleague Sara. When Sara, who finds the treasure, contacts Billano, Sara is attacked by a large whale and gets lost by the whale.

This is a shooting game in the sea where the main character becomes Billano to recover the treasure.

Dynamic undersea shooting game!

Level - Hard

[Control]

  • WASD -> Move
  • Left Shift -> Use Copy Skill (It's only copied at enemy action.)
  • Left Ctrl -> Use Copied Skill
  • Left Alt -> See the control
  • Tab-> Copied Skill Swap
  • Mouse Left Click -> Shoot
  • M Key-> Map
  • ESC -> Stop( You can choose Quit or Resume)

[Working period]

1 Month

[GitHub]

LawOfTheOcean_GitHub_Link

[BenchMark]

This game benchmarked part of Subnotica.
